subject: fix(resilience): add DB error handling to all views, remove phantom dep, deduplicate period logic
body:
All IndexedDB operations across 10 views now have try/catch with
user-friendly error banners. Previously, if IndexedDB failed (quota
exceeded, corruption, private browsing restrictions), users saw no
feedback at all â€” loading spinners hung or actions silently failed.

- Removed `date-fns` from package.json (listed but never imported)
- Extracted `resolveBudgetPeriod()` in projection.ts to eliminate
  identical 6-line period resolution duplicated in 3 files
- Added silent error handling to useCategoryAutocomplete (non-critical)
